verses.verse: And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096> <WG5633>, when <WG3753> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> had made an end <WG5055> <WG5656> of commanding <WG1299> <WG5723> his <WG846> twelve <WG1427> Talmidim <WG3101>, he departed <WG3327> <WG5627> thence <WG1564> to teach <WG1321> <WG5721> and <WG2532> to preach <WG2784> <WG5721> in <WG1722> their <WG846> cities <WG4172>.

Now <WG1161> when Yochanan <WG2491> had heard <WG191> <WG5660> in <WG1722> the prison <WG1201> the works <WG2041> of Moshiach <WG5547>, he sent <WG3992> <WG5660> two <WG1417> of his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>,
And said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, Art <WG1488> <WG5748> thou <WG4771> he that should come <WG2064> <WG5740>, or <WG2228> do we look <WG4328> <WG5719> for another <WG2087>?

Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answered <WG611> <WG5679> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Go <WG4198> <WG5679> and shew <WG518> Yochanan <WG2491> again <WG518> <WG5657> those things which <WG3739> ye do hear <WG191> <WG5719> and <WG2532> see <WG991> <WG5719>:

The blind <WG5185> receive their sight <WG308> <WG5719>, and <WG2532> the lame <WG5560> walk <WG4043> <WG5719>, the lepers <WG3015> are cleansed <WG2511> <WG5743>, and <WG2532> the deaf <WG2974> hear <WG191> <WG5719>, the dead <WG3498> are raised up <WG1453> <WG5743>, and <WG2532> the poor <WG4434> have the gospel preached to them <WG2097> <WG5743>.
And <WG2532> blessed <WG3107> is <WG2076> <WG5748> he, whosoever <WG3739> shall <WG4624> not <WG3362> be offended <WG4624> <WG5686> in <WG1722> me <WG1698>.

And <WG1161> as <WG5130> they departed <WG4198> <WG5740>, Yeshuw`a <WG2424> began <WG756> <WG5662> to say <WG3004> <WG5721> unto the multitudes <WG3793> concerning <WG4012> Yochanan <WG2491>, What <WG5101> went ye <WG1831> <WG5627> out into <WG1519> the wilderness <WG2048> to see <WG2300> <WG5664>? A reed <WG2563> shaken <WG4531> <WG5746> with <WG5259> the wind <WG417>?

But <WG235> what <WG5101> went ye out <WG1831> <WG5627> for to see <WG1492> <WG5629>? A man <WG444> clothed <WG294> <WG5772> in <WG1722> soft <WG3120> raiment <WG2440>? behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, they that wear <WG5409> <WG5723> soft <WG3120> clothing are <WG1526> <WG5748> in <WG1722> kings <WG935>' houses <WG3624>.

But <WG235> what <WG5101> went ye out <WG1831> <WG5627> for to see <WG1492> <WG5629>? A prophet <WG4396>? yea <WG3483>, I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, and <WG2532> more <WG4055> than a prophet <WG4396>.

For <WG1063> this <WG3778> is <WG2076> <WG5748> he, of <WG4012> whom <WG3739> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769>, Behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, I <WG1473> send <WG649> <WG5719> my <WG3450> messenger <WG32> before <WG4253> thy <WG4675> face <WG4383>, which <WG3739> shall prepare <WG2680> <WG5692> thy <WG4675> way <WG3598> before <WG1715> thee <WG4675>.

Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, Among <WG1722> them that are born <WG1084> of women <WG1135> there hath <WG1453> not <WG3756> risen <WG1453> <WG5769> a greater than <WG3187> Yochanan <WG2491> the Immerser <WG910>: notwithstanding <WG1161> he that is least <WG3398> in <WG1722> the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> is <WG2076> <WG5748> greater than <WG3187> he <WG846>.

And <WG1161> from <WG575> the days <WG2250> of Yochanan <WG2491> the Immerser <WG910> until <WG2193> now <WG737> the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> suffereth violence <WG971> <WG5743>, and <WG2532> the violent <WG973> take <WG726> it <WG846> by force <WG726> <WG5719>.
For <WG1063> all <WG3956> the prophets <WG4396> and <WG2532> the Torah <WG3551> prophesied <WG4395> <WG5656> until <WG2193> Yochanan <WG2491>.
And <WG2532> if <WG1487> ye will <WG2309> <WG5719> receive <WG1209> <WG5664> it, this <WG846> is <WG2076> <WG5748> Eliyah <WG2243>, which <WG3588> was for <WG3195> <WG5723> to come <WG2064> <WG5738>.
He that hath <WG2192> <WG5723> ears <WG3775> to hear <WG191> <WG5721>, let him hear <WG191> <WG5720>.

But <WG1161> whereunto <WG5101> shall I liken <WG3666> <WG5692> this <WG5026> generation <WG1074>? It is <WG2076> <WG5748> like <WG3664> unto children <WG3808> sitting <WG2521> <WG5740> in <WG1722> the markets <WG58>, and <WG2532> calling <WG4377> <WG5723> unto their <WG846> fellows <WG2083>,

And <WG2532> saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, We have piped <WG832> <WG5656> unto you <WG5213>, and <WG2532> ye have <WG3738> not <WG3756> danced <WG3738> <WG5662>; we have mourned <WG2354> <WG5656> unto you <WG5213>, and <WG2532> ye have <WG2875> not <WG3756> lamented <WG2875> <WG5668>.

For <WG1063> Yochanan <WG2491> came <WG2064> <WG5627> neither <WG3383> eating <WG2068> <WG5723> nor <WG3383> drinking <WG4095> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> they say <WG3004> <WG5719>, He hath <WG2192> <WG5719> a devil <WG1140>.

The Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> came <WG2064> <WG5627> eating <WG2068> <WG5723> and <WG2532> drinking <WG4095> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> they say <WG3004> <WG5719>, Behold <WG2400> <WG5628> a man <WG444> gluttonous <WG5314>, and <WG2532> a winebibber <WG3630>, a friend <WG5384> of publicans <WG5057> and <WG2532> sinners <WG268>. But <WG2532> wisdom <WG4678> is justified <WG1344> <WG5681> of <WG575> her <WG846> children <WG5043>.

Then <WG5119> began he <WG756> <WG5662> to upbraid <WG3679> <WG5721> the cities <WG4172> wherein <WG1722> <WG3739> most <WG4118> of his <WG846> mighty works <WG1411> were done <WG1096> <WG5633>, because <WG3754> they repented <WG3340> <WG5656> not <WG3756>:

Woe <WG3759> unto thee <WG4671>, Chorazin <WG5523>! woe <WG3759> unto thee <WG4671>, Beit-TZaidah <WG966>! for <WG3754> if <WG1487> the mighty works <WG1411>, which <WG3588> were done <WG1096> <WG5637> in <WG1722> you <WG5213>, had been done <WG1096> <WG5633> in <WG1722> TZor <WG5184> and <WG2532> TZidon <WG4605>, they would have repented <WG3340> <WG5656> long ago <WG302> <WG3819> in <WG1722> sackcloth <WG4526> and <WG2532> ashes <WG4700>.

But <WG4133> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, It shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> more tolerable <WG414> for TZor <WG5184> and <WG2532> TZidon <WG4605> at <WG1722> the day <WG2250> of judgment <WG2920>, than <WG2228> for you <WG5213>.

And <WG2532> thou <WG4771>, K'far-Nachum <WG2584>, which <WG3588> art exalted <WG5312> <WG5685> unto <WG2193> heaven <WG3772>, shalt be brought down <WG2601> <WG5701> to <WG2193> SH'ol <WG86>: for <WG3754> if <WG1487> the mighty works <WG1411>, which <WG3588> have been done <WG1096> <WG5637> in <WG1722> thee <WG4671>, had been done <WG1096> <WG5633> in <WG1722> Sodom <WG4670>, it would have remained <WG302> <WG3306> <WG5656> until <WG3360> this day <WG4594>.

But <WG4133> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, That <WG3754> it shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> more tolerable <WG414> for the land <WG1093> of Sodom <WG4670> in <WG1722> the day <WG2250> of judgment <WG2920>, than <WG2228> for thee <WG4671>.

At <WG1722> that <WG1565> time <WG2540> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> answered <WG611> <WG5679> and said <WG2036> <WG5627>, I thank <WG1843> <WG5731> thee <WG4671>, O Father <WG3962>, YY <WG2962> of heaven <WG3772> and <WG2532> earth <WG1093>, because <WG3754> thou hast hid <WG613> <WG5656> these things <WG5023> from <WG575> the wise <WG4680> and <WG2532> prudent <WG4908>, and <WG2532> hast revealed <WG601> <WG5656> them <WG846> unto babes <WG3516>.
Havahn so <WG3483>, Father <WG3962>: for <WG3754> so <WG3779> it seemed <WG1096> <WG5633> good <WG2107> in thy <WG4675> sight <WG1715>.

All things <WG3956> are delivered <WG3860> <WG5681> unto me <WG3427> of <WG5259> my <WG3450> Father <WG3962>: and <WG2532> no man <WG3762> knoweth <WG1921> <WG5719> the Son <WG5207>, but <WG1508> the Father <WG3962>; neither <WG3761> knoweth <WG1921> <WG5719> any man <WG5100> the Father <WG3962>, save <WG1508> the Son <WG5207>, and he <WG2532> to <WG3739> whomsoever <WG1437> the Son <WG5207> will <WG1014> <WG5741> reveal <WG601> <WG5658> him.

Come <WG1205> <WG5773> unto <WG4314> me <WG3165>, all <WG3956> ye that labour <WG2872> <WG5723> and <WG2532> are heavy laden <WG5412> <WG5772>, and I <WG2504> will give <WG373> you <WG5209> rest <WG373> <WG5692>.

Take <WG142> <WG5657> my <WG3450> yoke <WG2218> upon <WG1909> you <WG5209>, and <WG2532> learn <WG3129> <WG5628> of <WG575> me <WG1700>; for <WG3754> I am <WG1510> <WG5748> meek <WG4235> and <WG2532> lowly <WG5011> in heart <WG2588>: and <WG2532> ye shall find <WG2147> <WG5692> rest <WG372> unto your <WG5216> souls <WG5590>.
For <WG1063> my <WG3450> yoke <WG2218> is easy <WG5543>, and <WG2532> my <WG3450> burden <WG5413> is <WG2076> <WG5748> light <WG1645>.
